name: Squirt Gun Girl: Garden Runner
description:
Are you ready to save the world, plant nanny? Get ready to water everything and do it with style in this epic race to the end running games you will water plants and keep the planet safe!

Carry your super water blaster gun and speed run these relaxing levels to get to the end and save the world! All you have to do is pick up the water and water the plants! Sounds easy! Yeah, it is! If you love relaxing, gardens, watering plants and fun running games you should download now!

These running games will take you through the magical garden to water all of the plants! The plants will help you make ti through this epic race and save the planet! Shoot that nom plant to get him to build a branch for you! Save the garden and put out those fires!


POSITIVE MESSAGE!

We should all try to make the world a better place! In this epic race of watering things you're one of the greatest super heroes that waters and takes care of the world! We can spread this message with more garden running games like this where you're a plant nanny that does something truly positive!


RELAXING

Take a break, time to relax and have some fun! No need to speed run a game like this, just be the plant nanny and help garden with your booty power in this epic race to save humanity! I feel like I have lost weight in these running games because of the exercise, maybe I have a 6 pack now!


WHO IS THIS GAME FOR?

People that love garden games! People that want to relax and have some fun doing an epic race in these running games that promote a positive message! Download now!



Now if you're ready get your running games squirt gun loaded and pick up that water and get your booty to the end of the level!"
